Detailed Description

Base class for items that save to their own file.

Base class for raw data items that can be archived in the native file format. Instances of this class can be shared between multiple container classes to avoid duplication of large data sets in memory.

true if the file for this object exists. Uses the full filename (with path) to validate.

Tries to find the instance with the given filename that may have been already loaded.

Parameters:

Returns:
Matching instance, NULL if not found.

QString DzStorable::getExtension (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]
Returns:
The three-letter extension to associate with storable items of each derived type.

Implemented in DzGeometry, DzMap, and DzMorphDeltas.

QString DzStorable::getFilename (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The partial path for this item. The partial path is the path starting from one of the user's content directories. If no content directories match the root path for this item, the full path is returned.
QString DzStorable::getFiletype (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]
Returns:
The filetype string that is saved as part of the file information

Implemented in DzGeometry, DzMap, and DzMorphDeltas.

DzVersion DzStorable::getFileVersion (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The version number of the file that this item was read from. 0 if the item has not been successfully read from a file.
QString DzStorable::getFullFilename (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The full filename (with path) that this object was last read from or last saved to.
DzLegacySourceInfo DzStorable::getLegacySourceInfo (  )  const
Returns:
The legacy source info for this storable. DzLegacySourceInfo contains information about the original source file from which this storable came.

bool DzStorable::isShareable (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Derived classes can override this to indicate if they should be shareable or not. If it is not overridden, it will return true.

DzError DzStorable::loadFromFile (  ) 

Called to do the actual data loading from the external file for this storable item.

Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.

void DzStorable::markChanged (  )  [slot]

Called to mark this item as changed (needs saving).

bool DzStorable::needsSave ( const QString &  filename  )  const [virtual, slot]

Called by the framework before saving the file - if this function returns true, the file is saved, overwriting any existing file. If it returns false, the file will not be saved.

Parameters:
filename The name of the file that will be saved.
Returns:
true if this object needs to be saved to a file, the default implementation returns true if hasChanged() is true, or if the given file does not exist.

Reimplemented in DzMorphDeltas.

void DzStorable::resetFileName (  )  [slot]

Called to set the file name to an empty string (needs saving).

void DzStorable::save ( DzOutFile *  file  )  const [virtual]

Saves the storable's data to file.

Parameters:
file The file to save the data to.
void DzStorable::setFilename ( const QString &  filename,
bool  doMarkChanged = true 
) [protected]

Sets the filename that this object will be written to. This is usually only called on objects that have not been saved to a file yet.

Parameters:
filename The path to the file where this object should be saved.
doMarkChanged If true, the storable will be marked as changed, ensuring that it will be written to file next time the scene is saved.
void DzStorable::setLegacySourceInfo ( const DzLegacySourceInfo &  legacySourceInfo  ) 

Sets the legacy source info for this storable. DzLegacySourceInfo contains information about the original source file from which this storable came.

void DzStorable::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Sets the path to the storable file.

Parameters:
path The subfolder that this storable should be saved to.

Reimplemented in DzMorphDeltas.

void DzStorable::setUri ( const DzUri &  uri,
bool  doMarkChanged = true 
)

Sets the URI of the asset file that this object was read from.

Parameters:
uri The URI of the asset file where this object was read from.
doMarkChanged If true, the storable will be marked as changed, ensuring that it will be written to file next time the scene is saved.
DzStorable::unableToFindFile ( const QString &  file  )  [signal]

Transmitted when a content file could not be found while loading.

Parameters:
file The name and path of the file that could not be located.
bool DzStorable::usesDeferredLoading (  )  const [inline, virtual, slot]

Derived classes should override this to indicate if they use deferred loading (do not load the object data at main file load time). If a class returns false, it must call loadFromFile() at a later time to invoke loading of its data.

Reimplemented in DzMorphDeltas.

void DzStorable::writeData ( DzOutFile *  file  )  const [inline, protected, virtual]

Derived classes override this method to write their data to file. This method is only called as needed and may not be called for each file save.

Reimplemented in DzMap, DzMorphDeltas, DzVertexMap, and DzVertexMesh.
